page.title: 06Family Day,Ravensthorpe (2)
page.content: Next I go to the village shop to buy some groceries which I forgot to buy in the supermarket in Northampton.At l pm I have lunch,a cheese roll,apple and cup of coffee,relaxing for l/2 hour reading the newspaper before changing into my tracksuit for an afternoon jog. 4 miles in 4O minutes.Just time for a shower before collecting the boys from school.Whilst the boys watch television I prepare an evening meal of casseroled beef,onions,carrots,tomatoes and potatoes.Philip does homework before dinner as he has a cub scout meeting in Long Buckby afterwards.At 6 pm. my husband returns and we have dinner in the kitchen.Whilst I wash the dishes Philip is taken to cubs by car.I bath Paul and put him to bed at 8pm.I fetch Philip from cubs and then relax watching television and reading before going to bed at llpm.Just another day!
